name: Kronos [1]
description: The top is decorated with the golden dragon which dominates the time and space and with the crystal ball containing strong magic. It was beautiful, but the problem is it's too heavy.
effect: Int ＋5,When using magic skills, there is 3% chance to enter a "Vision" state: M.Atk ＋25%, SP Cost ＋50%; the effect lasts 10 seconds

name: Kronos [2]
description: The top is decorated with the golden dragon which dominates the time and space and with the crystal ball containing strong magic. It was beautiful, but the problem is it's too heavy.
effect: Int ＋5,When using magic skills, there is 3% chance to enter a "Vision" state: M.Atk ＋25%, SP Cost ＋50%; the effect lasts 10 seconds

name: L.C.L Potion
description: Thick yellowish liquid that tastes like blood. Use it to earn double Base and Job Exp from killing wild monsters for 1 hour! (Buff's remaining time elapses when you're dead or out of combat but not when you're offline)

name: Labyrinth Forest Materials
description: Labyrinth Forest Material Pack, in which all kinds of Labyrinth Forest materials can be found.

name: Lace Ribbon Coco
description: Mr. Candy Cat's new work: Romantic and lovely Lacework Ribbon! It also smells like a chocolate dessert. Wearing it will make you the cutest kitty in the school. This one is mysterious black.

name: Lace Ribbon SugarFrost
description: Mr. Candy Cat's new work: Romantic and lovely Lacework Ribbon! It also smells like a chocolate desert. Wearing it will make you the cutiest kitty in the school. This one is pure white!

name: Lance of Dragon Tamer [1]
description: Armed with the Glaive of the legendary Petite knight, they were crowned "Dragon tamer". It is suitable for swift and violent assault and a rare good weapon with firm tactility. Young man, take it to create new legends! - by some legendary Blacksmith.

name: Lance of Dragon Tamer [2]
description: Armed with the Glaive of the legendary Petite knight, they were crowned "Dragon tamer". It is suitable for swift and violent assault and a rare good weapon with firm tactility. Young man, take it to create new legends! - by some legendary Blacksmith.

name: Lance [1]
description: Cavalry's favorite long-handled rifle can be used for long distance attack and cause great harm.

name: Lance [2]
description: Cavalry's favorite long-handled rifle can be used for long distance attack and cause great harm.

name: Large Job Potion
description: The potion helps increase a large amount of Job EXP.

name: Large Level Potion
description: The potion helps increase a large amount of Base EXP.
